name: TidbitTrivia

skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: tidbit trivia
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Tidbit Trivia
The skill that will let you feast on tidbits of information!

This skill will serve up a tidbit of trivia or challenge you to a complete a trivia quiz. Get the interesting facts alone, or play the game to work for them!

This skill should be supported on Alexa devices and applications.
Open the skill on your Alexa enabled device using the phrase:
"Open Tidbit Trivia"

This skill initially uses the English language.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
